statements: SELECT IFMISSING(`shipped-on`,"MISSING") as mis FROM default:orders ORDER BY mis
SELECT IFNULL(`shipped-on`,"NULL") as nu FROM default:orders ORDER BY nu
SELECT IFMISSINGORNULL(`shipped-on`,"NOT THERE") as m_or_n FROM default:orders ORDER BY m_or_n
SELECT NULLIF(score, 100) as n_if FROM default:game WHERE score > 50 ORDER BY n_if
SELECT MISSINGIF(score, 100) FROM default:game WHERE score > 50
